Text:
This may be a dumb question. But do i need Action Replay to DS? Or is this a software that installs Action Replay on NDS? 
Sorry for the dumb question. But great upload =)

THANK YOU!! 
I LOST MY CD!
its somewhere under my bed... lol
and kjellboy
you need a usb for action replay..

Heh, you're welcome. ^^ Yeah, actually I just came back to this page because I've now lost mine, and am I ever glad I uploaded it. And Kjell, you need the actual Action Replay itself and the Mini-USB cord to use this utility; there's no way to just install it on the DS.
Also I now remember my old username. o.o;
